Author: CheChe_8
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: Hello admin good morning,i want to confirm something about the email I received last 2 days ago saying  Eвгeний Кayфмaн <eugen@playhall.com>     Jun 25 (2 days ago)     to me  Dear Archie Mallorca,  During the Token Sale the PlayHall team experienced the following difficulties:      Regulators stricter and tighter policies;      Application stores has made their policies regarding crypto- and tokenized apps/games stricter;      Our global road show (US, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Russia and Ukraine) resulted in a lot of applications to participate in the Token Sale, which failed to translate into tangible results due to the aforementioned reasons.   Based on this we realize that successful conduct of the Token Sale and implementation of the product in its original form (using cryptocurrencies and PHT) is in jeopardy.  The team will continue to work on the project without the Token Sale. And, possibly, the product will be implemented without the use of cryptocurrency. It is also possible that we reconsider carrying out a Token sale in the future, when the product is in the late stages of completion.  We would like to express our sincere gratitude to our community and Token Sale participants. We spent a lot of time to study this issue, consulted our advisors and made this difficult decision. We value our reputation and therefore PlayHall is the first project ever to make an independent decision to fully reimburse all the invested funds to our Token Sale participants. Hence, we bear all the campaign costs ourselves.  The funds will be reimbursed to the wallet, that you specified while registering:   0x104a020e542271002ff5fe14ac21e71bf515a6b0  In case you wish to have your funds reimbursed to another wallet, we kindly ask you to provide us with the wallet’s details in a reply to this letter within 5 days since receiving this notification. After these 5 days, the funds will be automatically reimbursed to the originally specified wallet. PHT tokens are frozen on your wallets (all transfers blocked).  This is not a public announcement yet. The public one will be made later.  Sincerely,  Eugen Kaufman  CEO, Founder PlayHall Platform  Tekegram @eugen_x  PLEASE CLARIFY THANK YOU

Author: wiserico
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: PlayHall  has been added to  WISERICO tracker    Vote for the PlayHall on WISERICO and follow PlayHall on the  media platforms:  Telegram Twitter Facebook Medium  PlayHall is — a decentralized platform for Skill Gaming on mobile apps. Our platform focuses on gamers out-wit their opponents in order to achieve victory. It offers both PvP matches and global tournaments.  PlayHall tokens allow gamers to participate in tournaments - and also can be used to vote on issues pertaining to the platform's management and organization.  PHT tokens can be used in PvP matches in addition to many other cryptocurrencies available on the platform.  PlayHall is a platform that allows players to compete against adversaries to demonstrate who ultimately has the most skill, intellectual rigor, reaction time, and awareness. Outplay your opponents to win more cryptocurrency!  We have already launched a beta version of the platform which offers first games to play for demo-tokens.  WISERICO on BITCOINTALK

Author: Blockgraham
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: They published today in Telegram channel How to participate in the token pre-sale:  1. Go to our official website at http://playhall.io 2. Click either the "Login" or "BUY TOKENS" button, which will replace the current "APPLY FOR PRESALE" button. 3. If you have already created an account and logged in using the "Remember me" mode, you will log in to your account automatically. 3.2 If you have not logged in, you need to log in. 3.3 In case you do not have an account yet, you need to create one. 4. If you have applied for Presale, you will see the following fields in your account already filled in: - Total amount - Cryptocurrency of your choice - First name - Second name - Country of origin 5. Additionally, you will need to do the following: - Enter your ETH wallet address - Confirm that you are 18 years old and that you abide by law - Confirm that all the data you have entered are correct 6. Click "BUY TOKENS" (next) 7.1. If you are the United States citizen, you will see a special page containing the list of the accredited investors from the USA. This will be the final step. 7.2. If you are not the United States citizen, you will need to comply with all the formal requirements by checking the four boxes that will pop up, in case if you haven’t done this earlier. 8. Finally, you will be forwarded to the page with the payment details: - If you have selected ETH as a payment currency, you will see the smart contract information in ETH; - If you have selected BTC as a payment currency, you will see the information about the BTC wallet, and to what ETH wallet the tokens will be transferred.   - If you have selected another cryptocurrency for payment, you will need to enter the wallet address, which you plan use for payment, and press the "BUY" button. Then you will see the altcoin wallet address.   Several things to notice:  -Your wallet should be ERC20-compatible; -It’s forbidden to use exchange wallets; -We recommend using ETH for purchase, as it’s the fastest way to receive your tokens via smart-contract, while other currencies may take up to 24 hours to process.  Multi-cryptocurrency platform Playhall.io is a platform for Skill Gaming on mobileapps. It offers both PvP matches and global tournaments. Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: Name: Playhall What: Multicryptocurrency gaming platform Web: https://goo.gl/kQFvmc Telegram: News https://goo.gl/rxyRMz   Chat https://goo.gl/CCYt1J When: ICO 26.02.2018 - 27.03.2018   Blockchain: Ethereum ICO Hard Cap: 16к ETH (14 mln USD) Team: Management consists of professionals in their field CEO Evgeny Kaufman (has extensive experience in creating startups) CTO Vadim Nareyko (experienced project Manager software and agile methods) CVO Anton Kulichkin (more than 13 years of activity in the financial sphere and an experienced person in the blockchain environment) Among the advisers there are many famous people, it is possible to distinguish such a figure as Alexander Borodich, perhaps the most respected investor in the field of blockchain in Russia Social activity: About 1300 views on Bitcointalk. Medium activity of subscribers on Twitter and Facebook – 220 and about 2000 subscribers, respectively. Activity in Telegram - about 1300 people. There is code on Github. Hype-score: Medium Project description: PlayHall-is a decentralized platform for mobile games, known as  «Skill Gaming», where you need to join a permanent fight for the championship in both PvP matches and in global tournaments. Tokens will be the fuel of the platform, they are a decision-making tool related to the management of the platform and the organization of the gameplay by voting sustem, also they can be used as a game currency - There is a beta version of the platform on which you can play first games with demo tokens as a prize - The platform will be available on computers and mobile devices - The project invites game developers to cooperate and integrate their games into the platform and will pay a reward every time someone plays the game Now playing games is closer to being not only a hobby, but also a way to make money Road-map: • July 2018 – implementation of the voting system • August 2018 - Launch of the first 20 games • September 2018 - The first tournament will take place • Further increase of the number of games Risk-score: Low

Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: The tokens will be used for the mobile platform gamification aiming at maintaining interest to gaming and rewarding active players. The tokens will give an opportunity to develop the decentralized virtual gaming market and also to participate in matches and tournaments. Gamers can use any cryptocurrency available on the platform, including PHT tokens,  to bet in PvP matches.   The main application of tokens is participating in tournaments and prize-fund tournaments. They will be also used in the voting system, with which the platform will be managed  in a decentralized way (participants vote using their PHT tokens).

Steady growth in the popularity of the games offered on the platform will lead to an increase in the number of active players.

Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: Commission of the platform is 3% in the matches, and 5% in tournaments. One part of the commission will be sent to the formation of the prize fund, and  the other part (see WP Section using tokens). Regular tournaments with a prize fund will be held on the platform. Part of the platform commission from each win will be transferred to the formation of the prize fund, etc.

Body: What will happen to my investments if the tokens are banned or the legal regulation is introduced to them?

Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: Tokens are built on the basis of blockchain technology. Blockchain is a decentralized system in which the release of tokens and crypto currency is not regulated by any state. With regard to the turnover of crypto-currencies, at the present time all states are following the path of liberalization, including Russia, which planned to prohibit the circulation of crypto-currencies, but refused these plans. Today, in no country in the world the use of crypto-currencies (and, in particular, tokens) is  prohibited. In the unlikely event that in the country of your residency the tokens are banned, you will be able to sell them in advance before the ban enters into force.

Author: tousika
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: What kind of game is it?

Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: Thank you for your interest! We are planning to launch games both for computers and for mobiles. Regarding unique points, to put it briefly, we try to offer our users another approach to gaming. So that gaming can be not only hobby but even a way to earn money. Moreover, our platform is based on blockchain which ensures protection from any kind of fraud and biased results.  More details you can find in our WhitePaper

Author: BlockHash
Title: ⚡⚡⚡ [ANN] [ICO] PLAYHALL - Multiplayer Decentralized Gaming Platform
Body: There will be a great variety of games on our platform. What's more, we will add more and more new games there on a regular basis  We invite developers to cooperate and integrate their games with our platform. Developers will get a reward each time gamers play their games. Please find more details in our WhitePaper
